listitem.para: The binary release is a zip file containing an already built binary release of Telscale JAIN SLEE

section.title: Binary Release
section.para: You can download the Binary zip files from DOWNLOAD LATEST SLEE RELEASE

procedure.para: To perform the installation, simply extract the content of the downloaded zip file to the directory of your choice on your computer.

step.title: Extract the release file
step.para: Unzip the file to extract the archive contents into the location of your choice. You can do this using the JDK jar tool (or any other ZIP extraction tool). In the example below, it is assumed that the downloaded zip file is named telscale-slee-&THIS.VERSION;.zip and it is located in the /telscale directory.

step.title: Setting up JBOSS_HOME Environment Variable
step.para: You should now have a directory called telscale-slee-&THIS.VERSION;. Next you need to set your JBOSS_HOME environment variables. This is discussed in .
